results.firPara: • Celtic 3-0 Lincoln Red Imps (Celtic win 3-1 on aggregate)
results.secPara: Lincoln Red Imps will prove nothing more than a footnote to the tenure of Brendan Rodgers at Celtic.
results.webTitle: Celtic beat Lincoln Red Imps to put Champions League slip-up behind them

results.firPara: The first thing Daniel Agger remembers is that he was unable to control his body. He did not feel any pain but he was just lying there shaking. Earlier that day, 8 March 2015, he had led out Brøndby to face their rivals FC Copenhagen in a Danish league game. He lasted 29 minutes before being taken off. He then collapsed and was taken to the physiotherapists room at Parken.
results.secPara: He should never have played. He was carrying a knock from the week before and, like so many times in his career, he took a lot of anti-inflammatories – far more than the recommended dosage – and his body had had enough.
results.webTitle: Daniel Agger: ‘Maybe my story will make other athletes take fewer pills’

results.firPara: The Football Association has demanded that Englands new manager makes concerted and innovative use of sports psychology to build mental resilience in the face of the worlds most intensely passionate press.
results.secPara: After suggesting that the naming of Roy Hodgsons successor – expected to be Sunderlands Sam Allardyce – is getting close, Martin Glenn, the FAs chief executive, outlined his remit for Roy Hodgsons successor on Wednesday.
results.webTitle: FA: new England manager must cope with ‘world’s most passionate’ press

results.secPara: In todays Fiver intolerable behaviour, Christmas hamper cons and raffle farces
results.webTitle: The Fiver | A sweary and punchy manner

results.firPara: Its no surprise that Kreis didnt remain jobless for long after an abbreviated stint with NYCFC, but will manager and club prove a winning match?
results.secPara: Its no surprise that Kreis didnt remain jobless for long after an abbreviated stint with NYCFC, but will manager and club prove a winning match?
results.webTitle: Hopefully Orlando and Jason Kreis have been careful what they wished for

results.firPara: England are delivering at a European Championship. Seriously. The under-19s have reached the semi-finals of their Euros in Germany and for the coach, Aidy Boothroyd, progress is testament not only to the talent but the tournament experience developing at youth level. Some day soon, a nation and the Football Association hope, the seniors will reap the benefits.
results.secPara: As was the case in 2014, when Roy Hodgson oversaw Englands worst performance in World Cup finals history, it is a group that can be generally classified as the boys of 97 who have injected expectation into another miserable summer for English football.
results.webTitle: Aidy Boothroyd’s Under-19s give England hope for the future

results.firPara: • Klavan, 30, needed by Liverpool as cover in central defence
results.secPara: Liverpool have signed the Augsburg central defender Ragnar Klavan for £4.2m plus add-ons.
results.webTitle: Liverpool sign Augsburg’s Ragnar Klavan for £4.2m plus add-ons

results.firPara: Major League Soccer has made a name as an open and accessible league. RSLs banning order helps nobody, and hurts the image of the game
results.secPara: Major League Soccer has made a name as an open and accessible league. RSLs banning order helps nobody, and hurts the image of the game
results.webTitle: Why Real Salt Lake's journalist ban damages the credibility of MLS

results.firPara: The last time Mick McElwee went to Parkhead was in December 2011. He was among the Celtic fans, celebrating when Joe Ledley headed the only goal of a tumultuous match against Rangers. When they have a full house at Celtic, McElwee says, the atmosphere is difficult to describe. On Wednesday night he hopes there will be a wall of silence. McElwee returns as assistant manager of Lincoln Red Imps, aiming to cause one of European footballs greatest upsets.
results.secPara: This is a David-and-Goliath story with a twist. In domestic competition, Lincoln Red Imps are the ultimate Goliaths. They have won the Gibraltar Premier Division for the past 14 seasons. Overall they have won 22 league titles and 35 cups in their 40-year existence.
results.webTitle: Lincoln Red Imps: ‘Celtic are great but we want to finish the job’

results.firPara: Wayne Rooney has had one training session with José Mourinho but already believes Manchester Uniteds manager can make them serious challengers for major honours again.
results.secPara: Rooney was speaking at a sponsors event in Shanghai at the start of Uniteds two-game tour of China. Ive only had one day [training with Mourinho] since we came out, but it was a very good day, the training session, he said. But I think you only have to look at the teams hes had before and the success hes had with them, and were hoping he can bring that to us.
results.webTitle: Wayne Rooney ‘excited’ after only one training session with José Mourinho
